text:
Avoiding Suspicion

Nervous man in a busy street, glancing around.  
He feels a curse rising within.  
“I forgot my cap! What was I thinking?”  

---  

Near a clock, he checks the time.  
“It’s past seven! I must hurry!”  
“Why am I not afraid?”  

---  

Passing the garden, his mind wanders.  
“Fountains would be perfect here…”  
“Why do people choose dirty streets?”  

---  

Shaking his head, he refocuses.  
“Enough nonsense! Think of nothing!”  
“Just keep moving.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist is overwhelmed by his circumstances and reflects on his thoughts and distractions as he approaches a significant location.
